com.toxic.core.engine.base

Interface IScene

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IElement

    public interface IScene
extends IElement

    The basic object of activity. It allows update whole scene inner logic and switch between them.


    Author:
    Strelock

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void activate()
      Activate current scene on screen.

    • Method Detail

      • activate

        void activate()

        Activate current scene on screen.

        NOTE : if currently active some other instance of IScene it will be deactivated.
